name: Radial Impact
description: Radial Impact is a fast-paced, single-player game that challenges playersâ€™ reflexes by matching the sizes of two circles; one static and one dynamic.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7 or higher Processor: 1.80GHz Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Video card with 512MB of VRAM or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space Additional Notes: You may be able to play this game will lower quality specifications due to the simplicity of the game itself.

reviews.review_text: Three game modes, Time Trial, Classic, Wave, one game mechanic. Click the circle.  The music is mediocre, but it's the best thing the game has going for it.
